notes: irregular verb; past participle 'dato'; used with auxiliary avere
example_sentence_english: I want to give a hand.
I am giving my contribution.
I gave it to you.
The letter was given.
The documents have been given.
The instructions have been given.
I give my opinion.
You give good advice.
He gives a clear answer.
We give consent.

example_sentence_italian: Voi date molta importanza a questo.
example_sentence_english: You (plural) give a lot of importance to this.
They give support to the volunteers.

example_sentence_italian: Io davo spesso il mio aiuto.
example_sentence_english: I often gave my help.
You were always giving good examples.

translation_english: he was giving/she was giving/you (formal) were giving
example_sentence_italian: Lei dava troppo credito alla voce.
example_sentence_english: She gave too much credit to the rumor.

example_sentence_italian: Noi davamo il nostro tempo ai progetti.
example_sentence_english: We were giving our time to the projects.
You (plural) were giving clear answers.

example_sentence_italian: Loro davano tutto per la squadra.
example_sentence_english: They were giving everything for the team.

example_sentence_italian: Temevo che io dessi segnali sbagliati.
example_sentence_english: I feared that I gave the wrong signals.

example_sentence_italian: Temevo che tu dessi segnali sbagliati.
example_sentence_english: I feared that you gave the wrong signals.

example_sentence_italian: Speravo che lui desse il buon esempio.
example_sentence_english: I hoped that he would set a good example.

example_sentence_italian: Era importante che dessimo il nostro contributo.
example_sentence_english: It was important that we gave our contribution.

example_sentence_italian: Speravo che voi deste una mano.
example_sentence_english: I hoped that you (plural) would give a hand.

example_sentence_italian: Volevo che loro dessero più attenzione.
example_sentence_english: I wanted them to give more attention.
